column4: i installed RADEON open drivers from ATI but i can't get direct render working. if i run beryl the logo appears a few second but then my X is restarted. any idea?
you mean radeon? those aren't from ATI they are just reverse engieered drivers
at least the open source ones
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/RadeonDriver
what does glxinfo|grep rendering say?
no
see what your openGL vender says should sya mesa
well those drivers don't support direct rendering anyways
my grahic card is Radeon Xpress 200M
check your X logs /var/log/X.0.log
Xorg.0.log
what should i look for?
see if it says aiglx enabled or close to that
(**) Option "AIGLX" "true"
(EE) AIGLX: Screen 0 is not DRI capable
ok you have to enable DRI then
it might be enabled but let see anyways
go to /etc/X11 and pastebing your xorg.conf
http://pastebin.ca/297153
can I see your xorg.conf now want to make sure that it is setup correctly sicne I see it loads the dri
same problem with radeon.dri not capable
